name: Reef Architect!
description:
Performance Issues on Web? Windows Build available Below!

Created during the European Geosciences Union Video Games Jam at vEGU21!
See other entries here.
Learn about the EGU here.
Learn about SeriousGeoGames here.

Quick Tips:

- To start, select a coral on the Left Side Menu and click in the Middle Area to place it. Different corals do different things, read about it on the Right Side Menu!

- Press "Start Simulation" and watch your coral survive.

- Brain Corals Heal

- Branch and Stag Corals Spawn Fish

- Pillar Corals Defend

- Table Corals Defend

- Good Luck and Have Fun!
